Class ResourceManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.config.ResourceManager
public final class ResourceManager extends Object
Central registry for application resources (FXML, fonts, markdown, audio).

Callers can request strongly typed ResourceManager.Assets or look up arbitrary classpath paths. Each accessor provides both a safe optional variant (for optional audio/markdown) and a fail-fast variant (for mandatory layouts).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    ResourceManager.Asset
    Known assets bundled inside src/main/resources and resolved relative to the classpath root.

  • Method Details

    • findUrl

      public static Optional<URL> findUrl(String relativePath)
      Attempts to resolve the raw resource path (useful for assets defined outside ResourceManager.Asset).
      Parameters:
      relativePath - path relative to src/main/resources
      Returns:
      optional URL if the resource exists

    • findUrl

      public static Optional<URL> findUrl(ResourceManager.Asset asset)
      Returns an optional URL for the provided asset without throwing if the asset is missing.
      Parameters:
      asset - logical asset descriptor
      Returns:
      optional URL that resolves to the resource

    • getUrl

      public static URL getUrl(ResourceManager.Asset asset)
      Returns a URL for the resource or fails fast with a descriptive exception if absent.
      Parameters:
      asset - logical asset descriptor
      Returns:
      URL pointing to the asset

    • getExternalForm

      public static String getExternalForm(ResourceManager.Asset asset)
      Returns the external-form string for use with APIs that require textual URLs (e.g. Font loader).
      Parameters:
      asset - logical asset descriptor
      Returns:
      external-form URL string

    • openStream

      public static InputStream openStream(ResourceManager.Asset asset)
      Opens the resource as an InputStream, failing fast if the asset cannot be located.
      Parameters:
      asset - logical asset descriptor
      Returns:
      readable input stream

    • openOptionalStream

      public static Optional<InputStream> openOptionalStream(ResourceManager.Asset asset)
      Opens the resource as an InputStream if available.
      Parameters:
      asset - logical asset descriptor
      Returns:
      optional input stream which must be closed by the caller

    • readText

      public static Optional<String> readText(ResourceManager.Asset asset)
      Reads the entire resource into UTF-8 text which is handy for Markdown or JSON fixtures.
      Parameters:
      asset - logical asset descriptor
      Returns:
      optional text contents
